MAN.TITLE: imresize

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: An image which will be filterd. The image can be UINT8, INT8, UINT16, INT16, INT32, DOUBLE.
The filtered image which has the same dimension and class with imf.

DESCRIPTION.P: imfilter filters an image im with filter F. When im is a mult-channel image, each channel can be filtered with F seperately. Input image pixel values outside the bounds of the image are assumed to equal the nearest array border value.
